ValidationRule.description: On Surgical Opps you must fill out the field Primary GPO in order to move the opp to any stage beyond discovery
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (AND(OR((RecordTypeId = "012C0000000Urae"), (RecordTypeId = "012C0000000QLX0")), OR(ISPICKVAL ( StageName , "Solve"), ISPICKVAL ( StageName , "Execute" ), ISPICKVAL ( StageName , "Closed Won" )), (ISBLANK(TEXT( Primary_GPO_Type__c )))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Before you can move an opportunity to the stages Solve, Execute or Closed Won you must fill in Primary GPO Type
